,TRUE,2,3,2,1,3 bobz","2016-12-26T00:25:03.187Z","Kids oriented, Kids like it","

First lets be clear, this is not for AFOL. This is for kids and kids like it. First thing my 4 years old son did when he woke
column2: up every december morning is picking up is LEGO Advent calendar.

column1: -Terrible value for the money. I would never pay 40$+tx CAD for this. Found it for 25 from a reseller which
-plan, well there is just no plan. You have to look on the small door to build it, can be hard for kids.
Bottom line: Now that my son had this calendar he will want one next years...but only if i can find it cheaper than msrp.
